author: cnbc.com
title: Smithers Quality Assessments Names New Director of Sales and Global Marketing
text:
AKRON, Ohio, Feb. 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Smithers Quality Assessments (SQA) , a quality, safety and environmental management systems auditor and certification body, today named Scott McDonough as its new Director of Sales and Global Marketing. McDonough will work with SQA management and the Smithers sales and marketing teams to support the continued growth as the company seeks to augment services in line with the needs of clients in North America, Europe, and Asia. McDonough will report to General Manager Aaron Troschinetz as part of his North America-focused duties and to President Jeanette Preston in relation to global marketing efforts.
"Scott is joining the SQA team at a very exciting time as we continue to find new ways to serve an increasingly global group of clients. I am confident that his leadership skills and service-focused background will prove to be valuable assets for our clients and our team," said SQA General Manager Aaron Troschinetz.
McDonough began his career as an application engineer with Nordson Corporation and moved up through operations, marketing, and sales management roles with PPI Technical and DATAForge. He brings 16 years of successful B2B sales and marketing experience to SQA, with a focus on helping manufacturers in a wide range of industries overcome their product and process challenges. McDonough possesses a broad base of experience building strong customer relationships and delivering service solutions for manufacturers in the automotive, energy, medical device, packaging, and food production industries.
About Smithers Quality Assessments
Smithers Quality Assessments is an Akron, OH-based accredited quality and environmental management systems certification body, founded in 1993, serving small and large industrial, commercial, government and services businesses around the world.
Companies work with Smithers Quality Assessments when seeking certification to the following standards:
ISO 9001
ISO 14001
OHSAS 18001
IATF 16949
AS 9100
ISO 13485
SN 9001
Please visit www.smithersregistrar.com .
About the Smithers Group:
Headquartered in Akron, Ohio, The Smithers Group includes Smithers Apex, Smithers Avanza, Smithers Pira, Smithers Quality Assessments, Smithers Rapra, and Smithers Viscient. Each Smithers Group company provides technology-based services focused on a defined market. As a group, the diversity of market sectors and technologies provides stability and a platform for long-term growth. For more information, visit www.smithers.com .
